author: iarspider
body:
#### PR description:

Fix the following warning (emitted [here](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/buildlogs/el8_aarch64_gcc12/CMSSW_13_2_X_2023-06-29-2300/Fireworks/Tracks)):

```
/data/cmsbld/jenkins_b/workspace/build-any-ib/w/tmp/BUILDROOT/f5cd6de04936fb3fc3708b2650eeb400/opt/cmssw/el8_aarch64_gcc12/cms/cmssw/CMSSW_13_2_X_2023-06-29-2300/src/Fireworks/Tracks/plugins/FWTrackResidualDetailView.cc: In member function 'prepareData':
  /data/cmsbld/jenkins_b/workspace/build-any-ib/w/tmp/BUILDROOT/f5cd6de04936fb3fc3708b2650eeb400/opt/cmssw/el8_aarch64_gcc12/cms/cmssw/CMSSW_13_2_X_2023-06-29-2300/src/Fireworks/Tracks/plugins/FWTrackResidualDetailView.cc:62:14: warning: array subscript -1 is below array bounds of 'int[64]' [-Warray-bounds]
    62 |     hittype[i] = HitPattern::getHitType(pattern);
      |              ^
/data/cmsbld/jenkins_b/workspace/build-any-ib/w/tmp/BUILDROOT/f5cd6de04936fb3fc3708b2650eeb400/opt/cmssw/el8_aarch64_gcc12/cms/cmssw/CMSSW_13_2_X_2023-06-29-2300/src/Fireworks/Tracks/plugins/FWTrackResidualDetailView.h:69:7: note: while referencing 'hittype'
   69 |   int hittype[64];
      |       ^
```

#### PR validation:

Code compiles
title: Fix compilation warnings in Fireworks/Tracks
